name: Roasted Red Bell Pepper Bruschetta
description: Looking for an appetizer idea? Then check out these delicious bell pepper bruschettas that are ready in just 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 16  diagonal slices baguette French bread, 1/2 inch thick
1  jar (7 oz) roasted red bell peppers
2  tablespoons chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley or 1 teaspoon parsley flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 375Â°F. Place the bread slices on an ungreased cookie sheet. Drizzle about 1 teaspoon olive oil (of the 1/4 cup olive oil) on each bread slice. Bake about 4 minutes or until golden brown. Turn bread over; bake about 4 minutes longer or until golden brown.
Cut each garlic clove in half; rub cut sides over tops and sides of toasted bread slices. Discard garlic.

Drain the red peppers in a strainer in the sink. Cut the peppers into 1/2-inch strips. In a medium bowl, mix the peppers, parsley, Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil, the salt and pepper. Spoon onto toast.
